lines.i: Measurement of carbon dioxide in patient's bloodstream

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.168"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11307)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10294)/@code="19889-5" Carbon dioxide/Gas.total.at end expiration in Exhaled gas (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10293)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:11308)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="PQ" (CONF:10295)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.16 UCUM units will typically be "%".
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11307)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10294)/@code="19889-5" Carbon dioxide/Gas.total.at end expiration in Exhaled gas (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10293)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:11308)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="PQ" (CONF:10295)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.16 UCUM units will typically be "%".
